name: taggedjs-cli
description: quick setup and maintenance of a taggedjs project

scripts.build: run-s build:js build:dist:only build:gh-pages && echo "âœ… Build completed"
scripts.build:js: run-s build:bin build:js-stamp copy:js-stamp-files build:es-stamp copy:es-stamp-files
scripts.copy:js-stamp-files: cp ts-stamp/*.html js-stamp/ && cp -R ts-stamp/assets js-stamp
scripts.copy:es-stamp-files: cp ts-stamp/*.html es-stamp/ && cp -R ts-stamp/assets es-stamp
scripts.build:dist:only: cp README.MD ./dist/README.md && npm run build:dist:pack && rm -rf ./dist/js && cp -R js ./dist && cp -R ./dist/. ../dist
scripts.build:dist:pack: cp package.json ./dist/package.json && echo "âœ… copied package.json to ./dist" && node scripts/package-dist.cjs
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "patch" && git push
scripts.save:dist:git: cd ../dist && git add . && git commit -m "dist patch" && git push
scripts.build:gh-pages: cp -R js/. ../gh-pages/node_modules/taggedjs/js && cd ../gh-pages && npm run build && echo "ðŸ”¬ Built gh-pages"
scripts.build:watch:gh-pages: chokidar 'ts/**/*' -c 'npm run build:js && npm run build:dist:only && npm run build:gh-pages'
scripts.publish: npm run build:dist && npm run save:dist && cd ../dist && npm publish

author: Acker Dawn Apple
